data.client_settings: Discord Canary Build Number: 27445, Version Hash: 5812111faccb4f77ec0e4bce4f76c94c922fc4cc
data.actual_result: it takes multiple tries to get it to work and its VERY inconsistent compared to stable where it detect numbers from the first try and shows them for way longer
data.expected_result: Windows speech recognition should show number to choose from just like in Stable
data.short_description: Windows speech recognition very inconsistent on canary
data.steps_to_repro: - say "start listening" - say "show number" - observe that there's no number to choose from are shown - saying "show number" multiple times can get it to work but the numbers are very transparent and disappear quickly
